diff.regenerateHint: ðŸ’¡ Enter your requirements, AI will adjust based on the original and current results. For example: "Make it more concise", "Add more technical details", "More formal tone", etc.

chat.placeholder: Type a message... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.welcome: Select text and use quick actions, or start chatting directly
chat.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
chat.systemPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant.

defaultPrompts.polish: Please polish the following text to make it more fluent and professional. Strict requirements: 1. Keep the original meaning unchanged; 2. Only output the polished text, do not include any explanations or introductions; 3. Do not add any extra content:
defaultPrompts.translate: Please translate the following text into the target language. Strict rules: 1. If the text is Chinese, translate to English; 2. If the text is English or other language, translate to Chinese; 3. Must only output the translation, prohibit outputting the original text; 4. Keep the original meaning and professional terms accurate; 5. Do not add any explanations, introductions, or extra content:
defaultPrompts.summarize: Please extract the core points of the following text. Strict requirements: 1. Summarize key information in 3-5 sentences; 2. Only output the summary; 3. Do not add any explanations or extra content:
defaultPrompts.expand: Please expand on the following content. Strict rules: 1. Add relevant details and explanations; 2. Make the content richer and more complete; 3. Keep the same topic; 4. Only output the expanded content; 5. Do not add any explanations or extra content:
defaultPrompts.condense: Please condense the following text. Strict rules: 1. Remove redundant descriptions and repetitive information; 2. Keep core viewpoints and key data; 3. Only output the condensed content; 4. Do not add any explanations or extra content:
defaultPrompts.rewrite: Please rewrite the following text. Strict rules: 1. Adjust to formal written style suitable for academic or business scenarios; 2. Keep the original meaning; 3. Only output the rewritten content; 4. Do not add any explanations or extra content:
defaultPrompts.continue: Please continue writing the following text. Strict rules: 1. Keep consistent style and theme; 2. Logical coherence; 3. Only output the continuation; 4. Do not add any explanations or extra content:
